TopicTitle: Os contratos do modo carreira sumiram

Articles.Content:
Eu instalei alguns mods no meu KSP 1.10 (EVE, DistantObject, KSP secondary Motion, PlanetShine, Sigma, Scatterer e Astronomers Visual Pack), despois de instalar quando fui abrir meu save todos os contratos, tantos os ativos quantos os do prédio de missão sumiram. Não consigo mais realizar nenhuma missão  e assim não consigo mais pontos de ciência. Alguém pode me ajudar ? 

Quote

I installed some mods on my KSP 1.10 ( EVE , DistantObject, KSP secondary Motion, PlanetShine, Sigma, Scatterer and Astronomers Visual Pack), after installing when I went to open my save all contracts, as many assets as those in the mission building are gone . I can no longer carry out any missions and thus I cannot get any more science points. Can someone help me ? 

 

Edited December 11, 2020 by Vanamonde
Please post in English when not using the International subforums.

Are you sure you have all the right mods and the right versions for KSP 1.10? The list you’ve posted doesn’t contain anything that would change the contracts system.

Can you provide a screenshot of the Mission Control screen along with the game logs? You can find out how to find those here: https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/83212-how-to-get-support-read-first/
